entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Sarre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:53 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rouyn 2:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -23.6°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
